mni 0.2.0

  • Changelog

    mni Package:

    The goal of mni is to provide provides functions for downloading magnetic resonace imaging (‘MRI’) templates of humans.

    Installation

    You can install mni from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("muschellij2/mni")

    Data from http://nist.mni.mcgill.ca/:
